name: RiskySpace
description:
A strategy game inspired by Risk, but in space!

  • You command the purple team and your goal is to wipe out the green team
  • Click on a planet to select all the purple fighters, then click on another planet to move them there (if you click the background you'll deselect the fighters)
  • Take over planets by moving your fighters to them and when you take them over they will start producing more fighters
  • Planets with both teams fighters in orbit are contested and will not produce fighters
